p: We found that the expression level of casein kinase 1 (CK1) in the oncosphere was higher than that of adults by 2.435 times. In addition to the immunosuppressive effect of CK1 in the body of the oncosphere, combined with its structural and functional characteristics, we speculate that CK1 can also promote the adhesion of oncospheres to the surface of small intestine cells and tissue invasion, which is similar to the findings of a study on Toxoplasma gondii reported by Wang et al. [ 61].
